data.name: AuthenticatedOperationFailureTextReasonTerminationWithNonZeroExitCode
data.value: Failed to perform operation: Exit code - {0}

data.name: AuthenticatedOperationFailureTextReasonTimeout
data.value: Failed to perform operation: Timed out after {0} seconds

data.name: ClosePrompt
data.value:
What would you like to do with this session?
Deleting the session disconnects everyone from the session. Leaving the session open keeps your guest connected.

data.name: CommandRunTool
data.value: Run Tool in Current User Session

data.name: CommandRunToolElevated
data.value: Run Tool with Elevation Prompt in Current User Session

data.name: CommandRunToolSilentElevated
data.value: Run Tool in Non-Interactive System Session

data.name: CommandSelectHelperHighlightToolInstallMessage
data.value: The required feature "Windows TIFF IFilter" is not currently enabled in your operating system. What would you like to do?

data.name: ConsentHostLabelFormat
data.value: Your host '{0}' would like remote control of your computer. Your consent is required to proceed.

data.name: ConsentHostTimeoutLabelFormat
data.value: Your host '{0}' would like remote control of your computer. Your consent is required to proceed. (Automatically accepting in {1} seconds)

data.name: ConsoleRequiredSystemKeyCodeMessage
data.value: The console session is required to send the system key code. Currently you are on a terminal services session.

data.name: ControlPanelAcquireWakeLockDescription
data.value: Prevent sleep, auto-locking, screen savers, and inactivity disconnection while you're idle.

data.name: ControlPanelBlankGuestMonitorDescription
data.value: Black out the remote monitor so they can't see what you're doing.

data.name: ControlPanelBlockGuestInputDescription
data.value: Prevent the user at the remote machine from interfering with your work.

data.name: ControlPanelClearAnnotationsDescription
data.value: Clear everyone's annotations on the screen.

data.name: ControlPanelClipboardKeystrokesDescription
data.value: Send your clipboard to the remote machine as keystrokes. Useful for login.

data.name: ControlPanelEnableClipboardHelpDescription
data.value: Enable clipboard help for the Helper to process all copied text.

data.name: ControlPanelManageCredentialsDescription
data.value: Store credentials to enter on the logon screen later.

data.name: ControlPanelManageSharedToolboxDescription
data.value: Manage the toolbox located on the central server.

data.name: ControlPanelMicrophoneDescription
data.value: Select a microphone and view its level.

data.name: ControlPanelRebootDescription
data.value: Send reboot command to remote machine and reconnect afterwards.

data.name: ControlPanelReceiveFilesDescription
data.value: Send files to your machine. Cut/Paste or Drag/Drop are easier.

data.name: ControlPanelReceiveSoundDescription
data.value: Receive sound playing through the speakers of the remote machine.

data.name: ControlPanelRecordVideoDescription
data.value: Capture motion video to an AVI file on your machine.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectAnnotationModeDescription
data.value: Choose the annotation mode for the session.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectAnnotationStrokeThicknessDescription
data.value: Choose the annotation stroke thickness used for you to draw on the screen.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectAnnotationToolDescription
data.value: Choose the annotation tool used for you to draw on the screen.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectHelperHighlightToolDescription
data.value: Choose the tool used to select a region of the screen for optical character recognition (OCR).

data.name: ControlPanelSelectHelpProviderDescription
data.value: Choose the help provider to retrieve search results or other information.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectLogonSessionDescription
data.value: Choose which logon session to control on the remote machine.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectMonitorsDescription
data.value: Choose one or more remote monitors to view.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectQualityDescription
data.value: Choose a lower quality if network conditions create a slow connection.

data.name: ControlPanelSelectSoundCaptureModeDescription
data.value: Choose the sound capture mode for the session.

data.name: ControlPanelSendFilesDescription
data.value: Send files to the remote machine. Cut/Paste or Drag/Drop are easier.

data.name: ControlPanelShareClipboardDescription
data.value: Share the clipboards of machines in this session.

data.name: ControlPanelShareMyDesktopDescription
data.value: Reverse the sharing and share all or part of your own desktop.

data.name: ControlPanelSharePrintersDescription
data.value: Print documents from guest machine. It may take several minutes for all printers to be available.

data.name: ControlPanelSpeakersDescription
data.value: Select a speaker and adjust the volume.

data.name: ControlPanelSuspendMyInputDescription
data.value: Prevent your keyboard and mouse from affecting the remote machine.

data.name: ControlPanelSystemKeyCodeDescription
data.value: Send Ctrl-Alt-Del to the remote machine. Ctrl-Alt-Home is a shortcut.

data.name: ControlPanelTakeScreenshotDescription
data.value: Grab a still image of the remote machine desktop.

data.name: ControlPanelZoomDescription
data.value: Zoom in or out to one of several preset levels.

data.name: CredentialProviderAdministrativeLogonApprovedText
data.value:
Your request has been APPROVED.
Proceeding...

data.name: CredentialProviderAdministrativeLogonIntroductionText
data.value: Request passwordless administrative logon from administration.

data.name: CredentialProviderAdministrativeLogonPromptText
data.value: Please click the arrow to submit the request.

data.name: CredentialProviderAdministrativeLogonReasonRequiredText
data.value: Reason for administrative logon is required

data.name: CredentialProviderAdministrativeLogonRequestedText
data.value:
Administrative logon has been requested.
Please standby to await approval.

data.name: CredentialProviderAdministrativeLogonUnavailableText
data.value:
The system has become unavailable. This could be due to a network connection failure.
This view will automatically refresh if the system becomes available.

data.name: CredentialProviderElevationApprovedText
data.value:
Your request has been APPROVED.
Proceeding...

data.name: CredentialProviderElevationPromptText
data.value: Clicking Request Elevation or Yes will initiate the request.

data.name: CredentialProviderElevationRequestedText
data.value:
Elevation has been requested.
Please standby to await approval.

data.name: CredentialProviderElevationUnavailableText
data.value:
The system has become unavailable. This could be due to a network connection failure.
This view will automatically refresh if the system becomes available.

data.name: CredentialProviderErrorText
data.value:
The system has experienced an unexpected error.
Please click Reset or Yes and try again.

data.name: CredentialsRunServiceExceptionFormat
data.value: Error running service; ensure that the requested user is an administrator. Error message: {0}

data.name: CredentialsRunServiceInstructionText
data.value: Service mode required for this operation. Please enter administrative credentials to elevate into service mode.

data.name: CredentialsRunServiceWarningText
data.value: WARNING: If Windows UAC is enabled, you will temporarily lose control while Guest is prompted (Yes/No) for elevation.

data.name: CredentialsStoreInstructionText
data.value:
Enter credentials to be encrypted and stored. Your host can send these credentials to the screen at any time.
The user name is sent to normal text boxes. The password is sent to special password text boxes, so the password is kept secret.

data.name: EndPointStatusRefusedConsentDescription
data.value: The remote user refused consent. You can chat with the remote user to determine reasoning. You can relaunch this session to prompt the user again.

data.name: EndPointStatusSessionInaccessibleDescription
data.value: The session is in an inaccessible state. There may be another host connected to a logon session you're not allowed to access.

data.name: EndPointStatusSleepingForFreeLicenseDescription
data.value: Your installation has reached the limit of concurrent sessions it is allowed, or you've reached a licensing restriction. This will continue to try to reconnect until a license is available.

data.name: EndPointStatusSleepingForFreeSlotDescription
data.value: Someone is already connected to the session with your session role. This will wait a few seconds and then try to reconnect.

data.name: EndPointStatusSleepingForRetryDescription
data.value:
An error occurred connecting to your session. This will wait a few seconds before trying again.
Error: {0}

data.name: EndPointStatusWaitingForCaptureDescription
data.value: You have successfully connected to the session, but screen sharing has not begun.

data.name: EndPointStatusWaitingForConsentDescription
data.value: This session requires consent before you can take remote control. The remote user is being prompted for consent. You can chat with the user for guidance.

data.name: EndPointStatusWaitingForGuestDescription
data.value: You have successfully connected to the session, but your guest has not yet connected. Your session will start when they connect.

data.name: EndPointStatusWaitingForHostDescription
data.value: You have successfully connected to the session, but your host has not yet connected. Your session will start when they connect.

data.name: FeedbackCommentsInstructions
data.value: You can include your email in the box above if you'd like us to get back to you.

data.name: FeedbackRatingInstructions
data.value: Overall, how effective was our product during your session?

data.name: MacBigSurReviewSystemAccessDialogScreenCapturingPermissionGrantInstructionsListFormatCannotTriggerPrompt
data.value:
• Click Request Access... above to open the Screen Recording panel in the Security & Privacy dialog.
  • Click the lock icon in the bottom-left corner of the panel to unlock the Privacy settings and enter credentials as needed.
  • Select the {0} client from the list, which should begin with "connectwisecontrol".
  • When prompted, click Quit & Reopen. The client should restart automatically. Permission should now be granted.
  • Click the lock to prevent further changes to this panel.

data.name: MacBigSurReviewSystemAccessDialogScreenCapturingPermissionGrantInstructionsListFormatCanTriggerPrompt
data.value:
• Click Request Access... above to show the macOS authorization dialog for screen recording access.
  • Click Open System Preferences to open the Screen Recording panel in the Security & Privacy dialog.
  • Click the lock icon in the bottom-left corner of the panel to unlock the Privacy settings and enter credentials as needed.
  • Select the {0} client from the list, which should begin with "connectwisecontrol".
  • When prompted, click Quit & Reopen. The client should restart automatically. Permission should now be granted.
  • Click the lock to prevent further changes to this panel.

data.name: MacCatalinaReviewSystemAccessDialogScreenCapturingPermissionGrantInstructionsListFormatCannotTriggerPrompt
data.value:
• Click Request Access... above to open the Screen Recording panel in the Security & Privacy dialog.
  • Select the {0} client from the list, which should begin with "connectwisecontrol".
  • When prompted, click Quit Now. The client should restart automatically. Permission should now be granted.

data.name: MacCatalinaReviewSystemAccessDialogScreenCapturingPermissionGrantInstructionsListFormatCanTriggerPrompt
data.value:
• Click Request Access... above to show the macOS authorization dialog for screen recording access.
  • Click Open System Preferences to open the Screen Recording panel in the Security & Privacy dialog.
  • Select the {0} client from the list, which should begin with "connectwisecontrol".
  • When prompted, click Quit Now. The client should restart automatically. Permission should now be granted.

data.name: MacGrantAccessibilityPermissionsDialogTextContentFormat
data.value:
To control this machine, {0} requires Accessibility permissions.
To grant Accessibility permissions:
  1. Click Configure Permissions to open the Accessibility panel within the Security & Privacy dialog.
  2. Click the lock icon in the bottom-left corner of the panel.
  3. If you're not logged in as an administrator, enter credentials for an administrator account.
  4. Select the {0} client, which should begin with "connectwisecontrol".
  5. Click the lock to prevent further changes to this panel.
See our documentation for more information.

data.name: MacReinstallUninstallPromptFormat
data.value: Please enter your password to allow the {0} client to reinstall or uninstall.

data.name: MacReviewSystemAccessDialogAccessibilityPermissionGrantInstructionsListFormat
data.value:
• Click Request Access... above to open the Accessibility panel in the Security & Privacy dialog.
  • Click the lock icon in the bottom-left corner of the panel to unlock the Privacy settings and enter credentials as needed.
  • Select the {0} client from the list, which should begin with "connectwisecontrol".
  • Click the lock to prevent further changes to this panel.

data.name: MacReviewSystemAccessDialogAccessibilityPermissionPurpose
data.value: To allow remote users to control your machine

data.name: MacReviewSystemAccessDialogPermissionGrantInstructionsLabelTextFormat
data.value:
To grant {0} permissions:

    {1}

See our documentation for more information.

data.name: MacReviewSystemAccessDialogScreenCapturingPermissionPurpose
data.value: To allow remote users to see your screen

data.name: MacReviewSystemAccessDialogTitleAndSubtitleLabelTextFormat
data.value:
Review System Access

{0} requires a review of the following permissions:

data.name: NotificationAdministrativeLogonRequestMessage
data.value: Administrative Logon has been requested for this device

data.name: NotificationBannerCapturingErrorMessage
data.value: Screen transmission interrupted, likely due to a UAC prompt in an unelevated session

data.name: NotificationBannerLogonCredentialsMessage
data.value: You have stored credentials available for this device

data.name: NotificationElevationRequestMessage
data.value: Elevation has been requested for this device

data.name: NotificationSendCrtlAltDeleteMessage
data.value: Ctrl-Alt-Del is available to be sent to this device

data.name: ProxyServerSpecifyInstructionText
data.value: Specify your proxy server and optional credentials. These values will be preferred when connecting to your session. However, other methods such as direct connection and system-specified proxies may be used in connection attempts.

data.name: RebootMessage
data.value: This will send a reboot command to the remote machine. The application should reconnect after the remote machine boots.

data.name: RebootReconnectCredentialsFormInstructionHtmlText
data.value: Enter credentials to allow the application to reconnect after reboot.

data.name: SendClipboardKeystrokesLargeClipboardDataWarningDialogDescription
data.value: Your clipboard contains {0} characters and processing it might require some time. How would you like to proceed?

data.name: SendFolderDialogDescription
data.value: Please select the folder to send:

data.name: SessionInvalidSessionAccessTokenInvalidMessage
data.value: Your session access token has expired or is invalid. Please relaunch this application to refresh the token.

data.name: SessionInvalidSessionDeletedMessage
data.value: Your host has ended the remote session. This application will now close.

data.name: SessionInvalidSessionForceDisconnectedMessage
data.value: You have been disconnected from the session.

data.name: ToolboxEmptyMessage
data.value: Your Toolbox is empty. Get started adding tools by using the options below. The Toolbox provides single click access to transfer a file to the remote machine and run it instantly.

data.name: UnderControlBannerTextFormat
data.value: Your computer is being controlled by {0}

data.name: UpgradePrompt
data.value: A new version of the {0} client is available ({1}). Upgrade now?

data.name: WindowsBackstageShellSearchBoxInputLengthThresholdText
data.value: Enter at least 3 characters to search
